job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen, implementeren en onderhouden van schaalbare en veilige back-end oplossingen met behulp van ASP.NET Core en Python.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes traditional software development tasks: building, deploying, and maintaining backend solutions, emphasizing scalability and security, which aligns with the definition of Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwerpen en bouwen van RESTful API's voor integratie met verschillende front-end systemen.
job_tasks.justification: Designing and building APIs for integration is a core software engineering task focused on connecting different system components, fitting the Software Development & Integration category.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met andere ontwikkelaars en architecten om oplossingen te ontwerpen volgens SOLID- en MVC-principes.
job_tasks.justification: Collaborating on solution design using established software design principles (SOLID, MVC) is a fundamental aspect of software engineering and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Bijdragen aan CI/CD-processen met GitHub Actions en versiebeheer met GitHub.
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to CI/CD processes and version control (GitHub Actions, GitHub) falls under the umbrella of operations and deployment pipelines, aligning with the Operations & MLOps category.

job_tasks.phrase: Ondersteunen van cross-functionele teams bij het integreren van back-end diensten in een microservice architectuur.
job_tasks.justification: Supporting teams in integrating backend services within a microservice architecture is a clear example of software integration and development.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met andere ontwikkelaars en architecten om oplossingen te ontwerpen volgens SOLID- en MVC-principes.
soft_skills.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions 'Samenwerken' (collaboration) with other developers and architects, fitting the Communication & Collaboration category.

soft_skills.phrase: Ondersteunen van cross-functionele teams bij het integreren van back-end diensten in een microservice architectuur.
soft_skills.justification: Supporting cross-functional teams implies collaboration and communication to achieve integration goals, aligning with the Communication & Collaboration category.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on traditional back-end software development tasks, including API development, integration, adherence to software design principles (SOLID, MVC), CI/CD, and microservices. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, prompt engineering, RAG, or any AI-specific model development or specialization tasks. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the required tasks and technologies, all of which fall squarely within traditional software engineering. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML, making the classification straightforward and highly confident.
